document.heading: Advisory Neighborhood Commission Office Space Amendment Act of 1992

history.narrative: Law 9-190, the “Advisory Neighborhood Commission Office Space Amendment Act of 1992,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 9-274, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 6, 1992, and November 4, 1992, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 23, 1992, it was assigned Act No. 9-311 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 9-190 became effective on March 16, 1993.
